name: puppet-docs
description: I created a Netlify static website that directly hooked into the documentation teamâ€™s generated HTML from AWS S3 buckets. I developed custom Node.js scripts for each of the seven product lines that run several internal scripts for static asset generation; I created all front-end JavaScript and SCSS assets, deployment automation, custom generation of a standalone preview site, and custom integrations with 3rd party APIs.

name: puppet-com
description: I created custom React.js components for a WordPress-powered backend. I developed custom Netlify plugins for connecting into the Netlify lifecycle, monitored site health with Sentry.io, set up custom search with Algolia.js, audited scripts for performance optimizations, and worked with Puppet to deliver features.
